vsParam:
Alright...
It's been a long time since we delivered Varerian the materials...

I feel excited.
Ho ho, what kind of cuisines will he make?

The flavor matters, but the quantity is also an important
aspect. I am just hungry.

Whoa, you are right on time.
I wouldn't criticize others if I were you, Anis.

Guys,
sorry to keep you waiting.

Ah! It's finally done!
What cuisines did you make?

Hee hee, don't be shocked! I made this specially for you guys!
Barbecued wolf meat with Ateria flavor!

The sauce is uni paste.
Dip the meat in the sauce before you eat.
Where did you learn how to make such a cuisine?

Really? I'd like to make some more delicate
cuisines if I got time.

Various channels. Some come from other people, and some
come from books... But, I learnt most of them by myself, I hope
you like them.

Come one! Try it.
It's getting cold.

Yeah, you are right. Let me taste it...
! What's this thing? It's so good!!!

Whoa! Is this really wolf meat?
It's completely different from the wolf meat I usually have!

The sauce is amazing too!
It goes perfectly with the intense-flavored meat!

Oh, really!?
Is my cuisine... really that good!?

Yeah, it's fantastic!
How wonderful it would be if I could eat this cuisine everyday!

You want to eat my cuisine everyday?
Ha ha, I see. This is a perfect idea!

Excuse me, I must leave for a second!
Please enjoy yourselves!

Ah, wait! Varerian!?
Where is he going?

Uh huh, there's a flaw?
The meat is mine!
Hee hee, first come, first served!

Darn it!
If you say that, I must eat more than any of you!

Ah haha... Stop that, you two...
Show your table manners...
